#### About

I am a PhD student at the University of Pennsylvania studying Quantitative Methods. My work focuses on the use of statistics, data science, and
machine learning for business processes and policy research.

I also like to play guitar.

This site is a working portfolio. Sample projects are featured in the tabs above.
